resources.string:
This is a free ad-supported version of Quickcopy. A full ad-free version is available in the Android Market.

New in v0.8.2:
*Fixed entry ordering
*Added titlebar
*Added Quickcopy keyboard (only in FULL version)

New in v0.8.1:
* Fixed issue with save/create button falling offscreen when having large entries
* Added option to only show titles
* Added "use title as value" option

New in v0.8:
* New UI
* Entry titles
* Password support
* Themes

Upcoming features:
* Backup/Restore method
* Group management
* Smart ordering

Thanks for buying the full version of Quickcopy. If you have any questions or comments about this application feel free to mail me on steven.v.bael@gmail.com
